msbt.message: Um Didn't we agree to meet at my home? I waited for you, but when you didn't show, I started to worry. I'm just so relieved to see that nothing awful happened to you. Please come visit sometime!
I'm sorry, I know I invited you to my place, but Something came up, and I can't have you over right now. I'm really sorry about this. Let's try again to do this sometime soon.
, I'm so sorry! We were supposed to meet at my place, but something came up Sorry to cancel on you like this. Can we meet up some other time?
